School of Professional Studies Bachelor's Degrees
School of Professional Studies Bachelor's Degrees

This page contains information about the bachelor's degree programs offered by NYU's School of Professional Studies, and features navigable links to pages describing each degree program individually, including admissions requirements, coursework and degree requirements, and financing options. Programs include BS in Hotel and Tourism Management, BS in Real Estate, BS in Sports Management, BS in Applied Data Analytics and Visualization, BA in Applied General Studies, BS in Digital Communications and Media, BA in Social Sciences, BS in Leadership and Management Studies, BS in Information Systems Management, BS in Real Estate, BA in Humanities, BS in Marketing Analytics, and BS in Healthcare Management.
